mapper.insert: insert into t_spjin (spjinId, spjinName, spjinMark, spjinMark1, spjinMark2, spjinMark3, spjinDate, spjinDate1, spjinZong, spjinJine, spjinZe, spjinType, spjinType1, shangpinId, shangpinName, sptypeId, sptypeName, spcangkuId, spcangkuName, spgysId, spgysName, userId, userName, bumenId, bumenName, roleId, roleName, spjinImg, spjinImgName) values (#{spjinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spjinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spjinMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spjinMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spjinMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spjinMark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spjinDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spjinDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spjinZong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spjinJine,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{spjinZe,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{spjinType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spjinType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shangpinId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shangpinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sptypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sptypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spcangkuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spcangkuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spgysId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spgysName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spjinImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spjinImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
